mapper.select: SELECT IDH.INFER_DETAIL_CODE, IDH.INFER_ITEM, IDH.TOTAL_QUANTITY, IDH.INFER_QUANTITY, IDH.INFER_TYPE, IDH.INFER_IMAGE, IDH.INFER_NO, IDH.INSTORE_NO, IH.INFER_APPLICATION_DATE, IH.CONFIRM_LOCATION, IH.CONFIRM_WHETHER, I.INSTORE_DATE FROM INFER_DETAIL_HISTORY IDH LEFT JOIN INFER_HISTORY IH ON IDH.INFER_NO = IH.INFER_NO LEFT JOIN INSTORE I ON I.INSTORE_NO = IDH.INSTORE_NO WHERE IDH.INFER_NO = #{inferNo} ORDER BY IDH.INFER_DETAIL_CODE
